pageContext.claim: “Well, I may do it myself. We're negotiating right now. I have the right to suspend it, and I may do it myself. I have the absolute right to suspend the payroll -- you know, to do the payroll tax and we call it a payroll tax suspension.”
pageContext.analysis: Few companies or individuals have taken part in Trump’s payroll tax cut. And consequently, it likely will have little effect on economic growth.
